Acknowledgements: Only open-source research software was employed in this study. We thank their respective authors for making it publicly available.
HowToAcknowledge: Please follow good scientific practice by citing the associated data descriptor: Sengupta et al. (2016), Data in Brief
Funding: This research was supported by a grant from the German Research Foundation (DFG) awarded to S. Pollmann and O. Speck (DFG PO 548/15-1). This research was, in part, also supported by the German Federal Ministry of Education and Research (BMBF) as part of a US-German collaboration in computational neuroscience (CRCNS), co-funded by the BMBF and the US National Science Foundation (BMBF 01GQ1112; NSF 1129855). Work on the data-sharing technology employed for this research was supported by US-German CRCNS project, co-funded by the BMBF and the US National Science Foundation (BMBF 01GQ1411; NSF 1429999).
